##########0: RICH TEXT 定義方式 start 如果設定一段文字同時具有不同顏色，則需要特別設定。 設定方式如下： 顏色;字型大小;實際顯示文字 <=此為每段文字所需包含的內容，每個屬性使用";"分隔顏色;字型大小;段落1,顏色;字型大小;段落2 <=段落設定之間使用" , "分隔顏色定義：COLOR_WHITE = "w",COLOR_GREEN = "g",COLOR_BLUE = "b",COLOR_RED = "r",COLOR_ORANGE = "o",如有新增請加入Define.lua - RichTextSetting，且把c3b的設定加入GlobalFunc.lua - GetColor中 範例： b;22;WILD,w;22;可替代除,b;22;SCATTER,w;22;以外的所有符號，WILD會出現在每條轉輪中。可參考各遊戲說明的製作方式 備註： 純色的text替換不需要使用到rich text，直接使用studio的label(text)即可，但單一UI請保持一致性。RICH TEXT 定義方式 end

ITEM_DESC_1_0:
Game card grants {GameDesc}.
It's removed from
inventory upon use or if unused
before expiry.

ITEM_DESC_1_2: Game card grants {GameDesc}. It's removed from inventory upon use or if unused before expiry.
ITEM_DESC_2_0: Placing a {Bet} bet grants players free extra balls.\nHowever, cards will expire and disappear if unused before their expiry date
ITEM_DESC_2_1: After betting {Bet}, next round has free extra balls.\nCard vanishes if unused before expiry.
ITEM_DESC_2_2: After betting {Bet}, next round has free extra balls.\nCard vanishes if unused before expiry.

ITEM_DESC_5_1: Charge {Bet} fee, start playing.\nDisappears upon expiration.
ITEM_DESC_6_0: Use the card for extra rewards, no extra bets needed.\nWinning earns more rewards.\nThe card vanishes after expiration.
ITEM_DESC_6_1: Use the card for extra rewards, no extra bets needed.\nWinning earns more rewards.\nThe card vanishes after expiration.
ITEM_DESC_6_2: Use the card for extra rewards, no extra bets needed.\nWinning earns more rewards.\nThe card vanishes after expiration.
ITEM_DESC_7_0: After using the card, you can get a bonus = winning points from the outer wheel (maximum {PlayValue})X{WinMultiplier}.\n(The card will be dissapear if it is expired.)
ITEM_DESC_7_1: After using the card, you can get a bonus = winning points from the outer wheel (maximum {PlayValue})X{WinMultiplier}.\n(The card will be dissapear if it is expired.)
ITEM_DESC_7_2: After using the card, you can get a bonus = winning points from the outer wheel (maximum {PlayValue})X{WinMultiplier}.\n(The card will be dissapear if it is expired.)
ITEM_DESC_8_0: After using the card to win any prize in the outer round, you can get a bonus = total bets in the outer round x max payout multiplier (bonus limit: {Play Value}). (The card will disappear if it is expired.)
ITEM_DESC_8_1: After using the card to win any prize in the outer round, you can get a bonus = total bets in the outer round x max payout multiplier (bonus limit: {Play Value}). (The card will disappear if it is expired.)
ITEM_DESC_8_2: After using the card to win any prize in the outer round, you can get a bonus = total bets in the outer round x max payout multiplier (bonus limit: {Play Value}). (The card will disappear if it is expired.)

ITEM_DESC_308_1: This card indicates that you will receive  {PH}  in real life, and the organizers will contact you within 7 days. The card will be removed from inventory 15 days after receiving it.
ITEM_DESC_308: This card indicates that you will receive  {PH}  in real life, and the organizers will contact you within 7 days. The card will be removed from inventory 15 days after receiving it.
ITEM_DESC_308_2: This card indicates that you will receive {PH} on your player's account, within {DAYS} working days after the end of this promotion. The card will be removed from inventory 15 days after receiving it.
